mapper.sql: AND TO_DATE(ORDERDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') BETWEEN TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')-1,'YYYY-MM-DD') AND TO_DATE(TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')+5,'YYYY-MM-DD')
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO PURCHSHOP ( CNO, ORDERDATE, ORI_200, ORI_500, ORI_1000, ERL_200, ERL_500, ERL_1000, SNS_200, SNS_500, SNS_1000, GUBUN, SALEPATH, ORDERER, COMM, MANAGER ) VALUES ( PURCHSHOP_PK.NEXTVAL, #{orderDate}, #{ori_200}, #{ori_500}, #{ori_1000}, #{erl_200}, #{erl_500}, #{erl_1000}, #{sns_200}, #{sns_500}, #{sns_1000}, #{gubun}, #{salePath}, #{orderer}, #{comm}, #{manager} )
mapper.select: SELECT (SUM(ORI_200)*200)+(SUM(ORI_500)*500)+(SUM(ORI_1000)*1000) ORI_SUM, (SUM(ERL_200)*200)+(SUM(ERL_500)*500)+(SUM(ERL_1000)*1000) ERL_SUM, (SUM(SNS_200)*200)+(SUM(SNS_500)*500)+(SUM(SNS_1000)*1000) SNS_SUM FROM PURCHSHOP WHERE 1=1

SELECT SUM(ORI_200) ORI_200_SUM, SUM(ORI_500) ORI_500_SUM, SUM(ORI_1000) ORI_1000_SUM, SUM(ERL_200) ERL_200_SUM, SUM(ERL_500) ERL_500_SUM, SUM(ERL_1000) ERL_1000_SUM, SUM(SNS_200) SNS_200_SUM, SUM(SNS_500) SNS_500_SUM, SUM(SNS_1000) SNS_1000_SUM FROM PURCHSHOP WHERE 1=1

SELECT A.CNO, A.ORDERDATE, A.ORI_200_ORDER || A.ORI_500_ORDER || A.ORI_1000_ORDER ORI_200_ORDER, A.ERL_200_ORDER || A.ERL_500_ORDER || A.ERL_1000_ORDER ERL_200_ORDER, A.SNS_200_ORDER || A.SNS_500_ORDER || A.SNS_1000_ORDER SNS_200_ORDER, A.ORDERER FROM ( SELECT CNO, ORDERDATE, CASE WHEN ORI_200 > 0 THEN 'ORI_200 : '|| TO_CHAR(ORI_200,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ORI_200_ORDER, CASE WHEN ORI_500 > 0 THEN 'ORI_500 : '|| TO_CHAR(ORI_500,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ORI_500_ORDER, CASE WHEN ORI_1000 > 0 THEN 'ORI_1000 : '|| TO_CHAR(ORI_1000,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ORI_1000_ORDER, CASE WHEN ERL_200 > 0 THEN 'ERL_200 : '|| TO_CHAR(ERL_200,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ERL_200_ORDER, CASE WHEN ERL_500 > 0 THEN 'ERL_500 : '|| TO_CHAR(ERL_500,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ERL_500_ORDER, CASE WHEN ERL_1000 > 0 THEN 'ERL_1000 : '|| TO_CHAR(ERL_1000,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ERL_1000_ORDER, CASE WHEN SNS_200 > 0 THEN 'SNS_200 : '|| TO_CHAR(SNS_200,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS SNS_200_ORDER, CASE WHEN SNS_500 > 0 THEN 'SNS_500 : '|| TO_CHAR(SNS_500,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS SNS_500_ORDER, CASE WHEN SNS_1000 > 0 THEN 'SNS_1000 : '|| TO_CHAR(SNS_1000,'999,999,999')||' 개' ELSE '' END AS SNS_1000_ORDER, ORDERER FROM PURCHSHOP WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY ORDERDATE ) A

SELECT A.CNO, A.ORDERDATE, A.ORI_200_ORDER || A.ORI_500_ORDER || A.ORI_1000_ORDER ORI_200_ORDER, A.ERL_200_ORDER || A.ERL_500_ORDER || A.ERL_1000_ORDER ERL_200_ORDER, A.SNS_200_ORDER || A.SNS_500_ORDER || A.SNS_1000_ORDER SNS_200_ORDER, A.ORDERER FROM ( SELECT CNO, ORDERDATE, CASE WHEN ORI_200 > 0 THEN 'ORI_200 : '|| TO_CHAR(ORI_200,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ORI_200_ORDER, CASE WHEN ORI_500 > 0 THEN 'ORI_500 : '|| TO_CHAR(ORI_500,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ORI_500_ORDER, CASE WHEN ORI_1000 > 0 THEN 'ORI_1000 : '|| TO_CHAR(ORI_1000,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ORI_1000_ORDER, CASE WHEN ERL_200 > 0 THEN 'ERL_200 : '|| TO_CHAR(ERL_200,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ERL_200_ORDER, CASE WHEN ERL_500 > 0 THEN 'ERL_500 : '|| TO_CHAR(ERL_500,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ERL_500_ORDER, CASE WHEN ERL_1000 > 0 THEN 'ERL_1000 : '|| TO_CHAR(ERL_1000,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS ERL_1000_ORDER, CASE WHEN SNS_200 > 0 THEN 'SNS_200 : '|| TO_CHAR(SNS_200,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS SNS_200_ORDER, CASE WHEN SNS_500 > 0 THEN 'SNS_500 : '|| TO_CHAR(SNS_500,'999,999,999')||' 개, ' ELSE '' END AS SNS_500_ORDER, CASE WHEN SNS_1000 > 0 THEN 'SNS_1000 : '|| TO_CHAR(SNS_1000,'999,999,999')||' 개' ELSE '' END AS SNS_1000_ORDER, ORDERER FROM PURCHSHOP WHERE 1=1
ORDER BY ORDERDATE ) A

SELECT TO_CHAR(A.SUNDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') startDate, TO_CHAR(A.SATURDAY,'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') endDate, TO_CHAR(A.TODAY,'YYYY-MM-DD (DY)','NLS_DATE_LANGUAGE=KOREAN') toDate FROM ( SELECT TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')-1 AS SUNDAY, TRUNC(SYSDATE, 'IW')+5 AS SATURDAY, TRUNC(SYSDATE) AS TODAY FROM DUAL ) A
